mapper.insert: insert into quser_info (id, uid, nickname, sex, sex_type, age, birthyear, birthday, bloodtype, country, province, city, career, company, hc, hp, hco, marriage, msg_num, emot_num, flag, photo_num, img_num, create_gmt, spacename, `describe`, cco, cp, cc, cb,signature) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{career,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emotNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{spacename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{signature})
mapper.select: select ifnull(max(uin),0) maxuid from ( select max(uid) uin from ( select * from quser_info order by id desc limit 10 ) a union select max(uid) as uin from quser_info_n ) b
